description: An ACAN is a public notice indicating to the supplier community that a department or agency intends to award a contract for goods, services or construction to a pre-identified supplier, thereby allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding, by submitting a statement of capabilities. This standing offer will be for a proposed period of 5 years. Respondents qualified and available to provide the described services/goods may submit a statement of capabilities in writing, on or before the closing date stated in this notice. Respondents must clearly demonstrate how they meet the advertised requirements.

full_summary:
### 2024 Tender for Exclusive Standing Offer - Security Services

**Tender Title:** Standing Offer - Security Services for the Enterprise Building Integrator (EBI) and Digital Video Manager (DVM) Systems

**Contract Title:** Exclusive Standing Offer for the Maintenance and Repair of the EBI Card Access and Alarm System (CAAS) and the DVM System

**Contract Number:** cb-924-36872006 - Amendment 2 (referring to solicitation #24-58073)

**Contract Duration:** From July 16, 2024 to March 31, 2029

**Introduction:**
The Security Branch of the National Research Council Canada (NRC) has invited qualified suppliers to express their interest in a comprehensive standing offer for security services. The contract is divided into two main sections: service and maintenance of the Enterprise Building Integrator (EBI) Card Access and Alarm System (CAAS), and the Digital Video Manager (DVM) system. The proposal is currently open for a statement of capabilities from qualified suppliers.

**Contract Description:**
This standing offer aims to provide a comprehensive service and maintenance agreement for the EBI CAAS and the DVM system located at the National Research Council’s campus in Ottawa. This includes scheduled inspections and maintenance of the equipment and modifying, maintaining, or updating the systems as required. Due to the sensitivity of the research taking place at the facilities, priority is placed on rapid response and repairs.

**Bid Specifications:**
The contractor selected will need to provide the necessary personnel for the maintenance and repair of the EBI and DVM systems, and be available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. All breakdowns and interruptions will be repaired as quickly as possible. The contractor must also commit to three years of supporting the system with maintenance and troubleshooting.

**Period of the Standing Offer:**
The standing offer will go into effect from July 16, 2024, to March 31, 2029, with no option years. Including the base contract and options, the estimated value of the work is approximately $1,355,072.86.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), as well as revisions to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and other agreements.

**Closing Date:**
The deadline for submission of a statement of capabilities is July 15, 2024,
